title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 29, 2020
itunes:title: DPS-BEST OF- Sep 29, 2020
description:
On Today's episode of the DP Show, Dan recaps last night's matchup between the Chiefs and Ravens. Are Lamar Jackson and Patrick Mahomes the new marque rivalry of the NFL? We're joined by ESPN Monday Night Football Analyst Louis Riddick, Actor/Comedian Keegan-Michael Key and Sport Illustrated's Senior NBA Writer Chris Mannix. Plus, Ross Tucker calls back in to own up on this botch prediction that the Ravens would win by double digits.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's episode of the DP Show, Dan recaps last night's matchup between the Chiefs and Ravens. Are Lamar Jackson and Patrick Mahomes the new marque rivalry of the NFL? We're joined by ESPN Monday Night Football Analyst Louis Riddick, Actor/Comedian Keegan-Michael Key and Sport Illustrated's Senior NBA Writer Chris Mannix. Plus, Ross Tucker calls back in to own up on this botch prediction that the Ravens would win by double digits.
